attributes.action: take decisive action to remove Mugabe and his Henchmen from their position of power over Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long have the people of Zimbabwe suffered under their tyrant leaders. Thousands are starving and so many children are without education. The "power sharing" deal that was dubious at its beginning has now been proven to be dead.

I hope that action is taken soon by the UK Government, or the EU for that matter, that will remove him swiftly from power by any means neccessary.
